meanings.definition: A unit of measurement in the Indian numbering system equal to one hundred thousand.
meanings.sent1: The school needed lakhs of pencils for the students.
meanings.sent2: She inherited lakhs of rupees from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel collected lakhs of acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The city was flooded with lakhs of tourists during the festival.
meanings.sent5: The farmer harvested lakhs of wheat grains from his fields.

meanings.sent1: There were lakhs of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The company made lakhs of dollars in profit this quarter.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out lakhs of colorful scarves from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The library had lakhs of books on various subjects.
meanings.sent5: The marathon attracted lakhs of participants from around the world.
